summary: An ordinance relating to and providing for the improvement of 39th Avenue South from Andover Street to Charlestown Street; by grading and graveling the same, providing for the necessary surface drainage; constructing temporary wood walk; and otherwise improving the same; all in accordance with Majority Petition No. 105966 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing for that payment for said improvement to be made by special assessment upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment in Bonds".
